segments.text: The kids are so sneaky, trying to get cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically hanging out of that cabinet, and the stool looks ready to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing stuff like that when I was a kid, but it never ended well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice when the water starts dripping on her dress.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her; she's going to have a huge mess to clean up later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside it's pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the kids don't get hurt when that stool finally tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR
